example_sentence_english: I ask for an advance on my salary.
Can you give me an advance?
We ask for advances from new clients.
We offer some advances on request.
I check the amount of the advance.
We access the advance through the app.
I subtract the expenses from the advance.
There is a mistake in the advance.
I have doubts about the advance.
We cover the deposit with the advance.
We move on to the advances now.
I start from the month's advances.
There are differences in the advances.
I read a report on the advances.
We manage the accounts with the advances.
